sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: STATUTE, in its general ſenſe, signifies a law, ordinance, decree, &c. See Law, &c.

Statute, in our laws and cuſtoms, more immediately ſignifies an act: of parliament made by the three eſtates of the realm ; and ſuch ſtatutes are either general, of which the courts at Weſtminſter muſt take notice without pleading them ; or they are special and private, which last muſt be pleaded.
